sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>stone</radical> that looks like a <radical>turkey</radical> <radical>boil</radical>ing underwater is just a <kanji>reef</kanji>.
meaningInfo: It may seem like there are a bunch of turkeys under there, but it's just the shape the reef takes. Though I guess if you're looking from above the water it really does look like a bunch of turkeys freaking out.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>reef</kanji> is the <reading>Shou</reading>gun's (<ja>しょう</ja>) favorite place to be nowadays. He sits next to the water, and stares down into it for hours.
readingInfo: You don't know if the Shougun likes the reef because he likes the beauty of the ocean, or if he's fantasizing about turkeys boiling. He's a... complex man.
